definition[0]: to become larger in size, amount etc, or to make something do this
example[0]: Do you want me to upsize your fries?
definition[1]: to start to use a bigger computer system than before
example[1]: The company hopes to sell to those businesses that are upsizing their applications.
definition[2]: to increase the size of a company by employing more people
example[2]: The Chief Executive said that it was an upsizing merger that would help the business grow.
